Control Name: Detects Unauthorized Changes to Software and Configuration Parameters—Processes are in place to detect changes to software and configuration parameters that may be indicative of unauthorized or malicious software.

control_attributes.Control: Detects Unauthorized Changes to Software and Configuration Parameters—Processes are in place to detect changes to software and configuration parameters that may be indicative of unauthorized or malicious software.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC6.8 The entity implements controls to prevent or detect and act upon the introduction of unauthorized or malicious software to meet the entity’s objectives.
